alerts.cannotRestoreFromImage: Scene couldn't be restored from this image file
alerts.clearReset: This will clear the whole canvas. Are you sure?
alerts.collabOfflineWarning:
No internet connection available.
Your changes will not be saved!
alerts.collabStopOverridePrompt:
Stopping the session will overwrite your previous, locally stored drawing. Are you sure?

(If you want to keep your local drawing, simply close the browser tab instead.)
alerts.confirmAddLibrary: This will add {{numShapes}} shape(s) to your library. Are you sure?
alerts.couldNotCreateShareableLinkTooBig: Couldn't create shareable link: the scene is too big
alerts.errorAddingToLibrary: Couldn't add item to the library
alerts.errorRemovingFromLibrary: Couldn't remove item from the library
alerts.imageDoesNotContainScene: This image does not seem to contain any scene data. Have you enabled scene embedding during export?
alerts.invalidEncryptionKey: Encryption key must be of 22 characters. Live collaboration is disabled.
alerts.invalidSceneUrl: Couldn't import scene from the supplied URL. It's either malformed, or doesn't contain valid Excalidraw JSON data.
alerts.loadSceneOverridePrompt: Loading external drawing will replace your existing content. Do you wish to continue?
alerts.resetLibrary: This will clear your library. Are you sure?
alerts.uploadedSecurly: The upload has been secured with end-to-end encryption, which means that Excalidraw server and third parties can't read the content.

auth.verification: The creator has turned on verification, please fill in the sharing code below

canvasError.canvasTooBig: The canvas may be too big.
canvasError.canvasTooBigTip: Tip: try moving the farthest elements a bit closer together.

colorPicker.noShades: No shades available for this color

search.placeholder: Search menus, commands, and discover hidden gems

encrypted.link: Blog post on end-to-end encryption in Excalidraw
encrypted.tooltip: Your drawings are end-to-end encrypted so Excalidraw's servers will never see them.

errMsg.Monthly_Quota_reached_maximum_limit_for_: The monthly account limit has reached the upper limit. For more information, please visit
errMsg.api_not_support: API function is not supported, Please refer to
errMsg.connection_timed_out: AI interface connection timeout, please try again later or contact
errMsg.daily_limit_limit: This tool's daily quota reached maximum limit, Please refer to
errMsg.limit_upper_limit: This tool's total quota reached maximum limit, Please refer to
errMsg.maximum_hourly_limit_prefix: This free tool's hour quota reached maximum limit. Please view
errMsg.network_err: Network error, please try again later.
errMsg.tool_disabled: This tool is disabled / deleted, Please refer to
errMsg.useless_channel: No available channels at the moment, Please refer to

errorSplash.clearCanvasCaveat: This will result in loss of work
errorSplash.clearCanvasMessage: If reloading doesn't work, try <button>clearing the canvas</button>.
errorSplash.headingMain: Encountered an error. Try <button>reloading the page</button>.
errorSplash.openIssueMessage: We were very cautious not to include your scene information on the error. If your scene is not private, please consider following up on our <button>bug tracker</button>. Please include information below by copying and pasting into the GitHub issue.
errorSplash.trackedToSentry: The error with identifier {{eventId}} was tracked on our system.

errors.asyncPasteFailedOnRead: Couldn't paste (couldn't read from system clipboard).

brave_measure_text_error.line1: Looks like you are using Brave browser with the <bold>Aggressively Block Fingerprinting</bold> setting enabled.
brave_measure_text_error.line2: This could result in breaking the <bold>Text Elements</bold> in your drawings.
brave_measure_text_error.line3: We strongly recommend disabling this setting. You can follow <link>these steps</link> on how to do so.
brave_measure_text_error.line4: If disabling this setting doesn't fix the display of text elements, please open an <issueLink>issue</issueLink> on our GitHub, or write us on <discordLink>Discord</discordLink>

errors.cannotResolveCollabServer: Couldn't connect to the collab server. Please reload the page and try again.
errors.collabSaveFailed: Couldn't save to the backend database. If problems persist, you should save your file locally to ensure you don't lose your work.
errors.collabSaveFailed_sizeExceeded: Couldn't save to the backend database, the canvas seems to be too big. You should save the file locally to ensure you don't lose your work.
errors.fileTooBig: File is too big. Maximum allowed size is {{maxSize}}.
errors.imageInsertError: Couldn't insert image. Try again later...

libraryElementTypeError.embeddable: Embeddable elements cannot be added to the library.
libraryElementTypeError.iframe: IFrame elements cannot be added to the library.
libraryElementTypeError.image: Support for adding images to the library coming soon!

errors.saveLibraryError: Couldn't save library to storage. Please save your library to a file locally to make sure you don't lose changes.
errors.svgImageInsertError: Couldn't insert SVG image. The SVG markup looks invalid.

exportDialog.disk_details: Export the scene data to a file from which you can import later.
exportDialog.excalidrawplus_description: Save the scene to your Excalidraw+ workspace.
exportDialog.excalidrawplus_exportError: Couldn't export to Excalidraw+ at this moment...

helpDialog.createFlowchart: Create a flowchart from a generic element
helpDialog.deepBoxSelect: Deep select within box, and prevent dragging
helpDialog.title: Help

hints.arrowTool: Click to start multiple points, drag for single line. Press {{arrowShortcut}} again to change arrow type.
hints.canvasPanning: To move canvas, hold mouse wheel or spacebar while dragging, or use the hand tool
hints.createFlowchart: Hold CtrlOrCmd and Arrow key to create a flowchart
hints.deepBoxSelect: Hold CtrlOrCmd to deep select, and to prevent dragging
hints.embeddable: Click-drag to create a website embed
hints.eraserRevert: Hold Alt to revert the elements marked for deletion
hints.firefox_clipboard_write: This feature can likely be enabled by setting the "dom.events.asyncClipboard.clipboardItem" flag to "true". To change the browser flags in Firefox, visit the "about:config" page.
hints.freeDraw: Click and drag, release when you're finished
hints.lineEditor_info: Hold CtrlOrCmd and Double-click or press CtrlOrCmd + Enter to edit points
hints.lineEditor_nothingSelected:
Select a point to edit (hold SHIFT to select multiple),
or hold Alt and click to add new points
hints.lineEditor_pointSelected:
Press Delete to remove point(s),
CtrlOrCmd+D to duplicate, or drag to move
hints.linearElement: Click to start multiple points, drag for single line
hints.linearElementMulti: Click on last point or press Escape or Enter to finish
hints.lockAngle: You can constrain angle by holding SHIFT
hints.placeImage: Click to place the image, or click and drag to set its size manually
hints.resize:
You can constrain proportions by holding SHIFT while resizing,
hold ALT to resize from the center
hints.resizeImage:
You can resize freely by holding SHIFT,
hold ALT to resize from the center
hints.rotate: You can constrain angles by holding SHIFT while rotating
hints.text: Tip: you can also add text by double-clicking anywhere with the selection tool
hints.text_editing: Press Escape or CtrlOrCmd+ENTER to finish editing
hints.text_selected: Double-click or press ENTER to edit text

tooltip.embedScene:
Scene data will be saved into the exported PNG/SVG file so that the scene can be restored from it.
Will increase exported file size.

labels.name: Name
labels.prompt_placeholder: Describe what you want to see. . .
labels.tips: Currently we use Mermaid as a middle step, so you'll get best results if you describe a diagram, workflow, flow chart, and similar.

library.hint_emptyLibrary: Select an item on canvas to add it here, or install a library from the public repository, below.
library.hint_emptyPrivateLibrary: Select an item on canvas to add it here.

mermaid.description: Currently only <flowchartLink>Flowchart</flowchartLink>,<sequenceLink> Sequence, </sequenceLink> and <classLink>Class </classLink>Diagrams are supported. The other types will be rendered as image in Excalidraw.
mermaid.title: Mermaid to Excalidraw

excalidrawPlus.description: Save the scene to your Excalidraw+ workspace.
excalidrawPlus.title: Excalidraw+

exportToImage.description: Export the scene data as an image from which you can import later.
exportToImage.title: Export as image

saveToDisk.description: Export the scene data to a file from which you can import later.
saveToDisk.title: Save to disk

loadFromFile.description:
Loading from a file will replace your existing content.

You can back up your drawing first using one of the options below.
loadFromFile.title: Load from file

shareableLink.description:
Loading external drawing will replace your existing content.

You can back up your drawing first by using one of the options below.
shareableLink.title: Load from link

publishDialog.atleastOneLibItem: Please select at least one library item to get started
publishDialog.noteDescription: Submit your library to be included in the <link>public library repository</link> for other people to use in their drawings.
publishDialog.noteGuidelines: The library needs to be manually approved first. Please read the <link>guidelines</link> before submitting. You will need a GitHub account to communicate and make changes if requested, but it is not strictly required.
publishDialog.noteItems: Each library item must have its own name so it's filterable. The following library items will be included:
publishDialog.noteLicense: By submitting, you agree the library will be published under the <link>MIT License</link>, which in short means anyone can use them without restrictions.

placeholder.githubHandle: GitHub handle (optional), so you can edit the library once submitted for review
placeholder.libraryDesc: Description of your library to help people understand its usage
placeholder.twitterHandle: Twitter username (optional), so we know who to credit when promoting over Twitter
placeholder.website: Link to your personal website or elsewhere (optional)

publishDialog.republishWarning: Note: some of the selected items are marked as already published/submitted. You should only resubmit items when updating an existing library or submission.
publishDialog.title: Publish library

publishSuccessDialog.content: Thank you {{authorName}}. Your library has been submitted for review. You can track the status <link>here</link>
publishSuccessDialog.title: Library submitted

roomDialog.desc_exitSession: Stopping the session will disconnect you from the room, but you'll be able to continue working with the scene, locally. Note that this won't affect other people, and they'll still be able to collaborate on their version.
roomDialog.desc_inProgressIntro: Live-collaboration session is now in progress.
roomDialog.desc_intro: Invite people to collaborate on your drawing.
roomDialog.desc_privacy: Don't worry, the session is end-to-end encrypted, and fully private. Not even our server can see what you draw.
roomDialog.desc_shareLink: Share this link with anyone you want to collaborate with:
roomDialog.shareTitle: Join a live collaboration session on Excalidraw

text_generation_prototype.tips: Experimental function, let AI generate a product prototype design drawing based on your description

toast.pasteAsSingleElement:
Use {{shortcut}} to paste as a single element,
or paste into an existing text editor
toast.unableToEmbed: Embedding this url is currently not allowed. Raise an issue on GitHub to request the url whitelisted
toast.unrecognizedLinkFormat: The link you embedded does not match the expected format. Please try to paste the 'embed' string provided by the source site

toolBar.link: Add / Update link for a selected shape
toolBar.lock: Keep selected tool active after drawing

hint.inCall: User is in a voice call

app.center_heading: All your data is saved locally in your browser.
app.center_heading_plus: Did you want to go to the Excalidraw+ instead?
